privates.name: Prinz Wilhelm-Bahn
privates.description: Blocks E14, may lay as a director power.

privates.name: Konzession Essen-Osterath
privates.description: In green, may place orange tile (#935) on E8 and may station.

privates.name: Seilzuganlage
privates.description: Once per game, can place a tile on a mountain hex for free as an additional tile lay (company need not be connected).

privates.name: Trajektanstalt
privates.description: May be used to upgrade one of the yellow hexes of Köln / Düsseldorf / Duisburg as an additional tile lay for free (company need not be connected). Company may also station paying appropriate costs.

privates.name: Niederrheinische Licht-und Kraftwerke (NLK)
privates.description: Receives 10% share of GVE for free.

privates.name: RhE Presidency
privates.description: Must immediately set par for RhE. Three 10% RhE shares start in the pool. The RhE will get money into its treasury for this when a connection from Köln to Aachen via Düren is made.

right: Revenue paid is equal or greater to Stock Price
